## Featured Project {#projects}

<div class="project-card">
<div class="project-card-content">

### Parent Planner

A caregiving coordination app designed to help families manage the logistics of caring for aging parents. Built with React, Next.js, and Supabase with HIPAA-compliant security standards.

**Key Features:**

- Care Circle with role-based permissions for family coordination
- Unified Care Calendar with task claiming functionality
- Secure Vault for medical documents and emergency information
- Incident Feed for tracking health updates
